column3: the food (and menu) was awesome as expected. I do think this place is slightly overhyped
column4: but we don't have that many good brunch places in Houston so I think that for what it is
column5: it deserves the hype. The food took a while to come out though (I think maybe 40 minutes or more)
column6: but I guess that's unsurprising. I probably won't come on the weekends given the crazy waits
column7: but will definitely try a random weekday visit in the future!
